project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts while storing the contact information in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add new contacts to the contact book
Implement the functionality to search for existing contacts
Implement the functionality to update existing contacts
Implement the functionality to delete contacts from the contact book
Implement the functionality to load contacts from a JSON file at the start
Implement the functionality to save contacts to a JSON file upon exiting
Write tests for each of the functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they function correctly
